allow-app-hide.description: Enables the app_hide command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-app-show.description: Enables the app_show command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-name.description: Enables the name command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-tauri-version.description: Enables the tauri_version command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-version.description: Enables the version command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-app-hide.description: Denies the app_hide command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-app-show.description: Denies the app_show command without any pre-configured scope.
